tweet: Chrysalis (#IOTA 1.5) Phase 1 is officially live on the #mainnet! We're thrilled to release the first set of features stemming from months of dedicated research and development. You can read more about today's upgrade here:  https://t.co/NUbRTiC9Iv #IOTA #Chrysalis

With 10 second confirmation times and throughput limit of more than 1000 TPS, #IOTA is now one of the fastest and most scalable networks. Our team and community have done an absolutely amazing job to enable this. Next up: Chrysalis Part 2, with even more significant improvements.  https://t.co/TOauXm3o2V

It's official - The #IOTA network now supports over 1000TPS! With this substantial increase, nodes can sustain higher transaction volumes & more transaction intensive applications. We’re excited to see the applications & use cases enabled with this new throughput! #Chrysalis  https://t.co/RtVbiytCO3

You can't imagine all the effort we put into this release, but finally all the work pays off! Now we also have a beautiful tangle in mainnet! Many thanks to my teammates, the community and the IF! #hornet #iota #IOTAstrong  https://t.co/1J82J6HBWv

IOTA users can now send & receive IOTAs in less than 10 seconds! Thanks to the reduction in the milestone issuance rate, the community is reporting an 8 fold increase in confirmation times. It's a huge step to make #IOTA fully ready for enterprise adoption. #Chrysalis  https://t.co/gLssWHGvdq

The upgrade to #Chrysalis  (IOTA 1.5) Phase 1 has finished. Restart Hornet 0.5.0 with the --overwriteCooAddress command once. Make sure to update your Trinity Desktop version. A Trinity Mobile update is also required but we are still awaiting reviews from Apple and Google. #IOTA

We are now officially performing the network upgrade for #Chrysalis (IOTA 1.5) Phase 1. The upgrade will take a few hours. Please do not try to send transactions using wallet software during the downtime. We will keep you posted throughout the day. Stay Tuned! #IOTA

It's today! The ZEDEDA Transform industry free event brings together industry thought leaders to discuss #digitaltransformation based on #IoT. Mat Yarger, head of Mobility & Automotive, will explain how #IOTA is being used to support COVID responses.  https://t.co/AH2eRWLLA6

It’s #giveaway time! 🎁 To celebrate the launch of #IOTA 1.5 we are giving away one Poloshirt (Size M)! Like, retweet and comment where you see the price of IOTA at the end of 2020! The winner will be announced on Aug. 23rd! #crypto #cryptocurrency #winitwednesday #win #contest  https://t.co/bBUMep4HRl

The upgrade to #Chrysalis (IOTA 1.5) Phase 1 is in progress. Once the network resumes, update #Hornet to 0.5.0. Please do not try to send transactions using wallet software while the network is upgrading. We will keep you posted about the progress. #IOTA

One small step for #IOTA, one giant leap for mankind...  At 10AM IOTA will implement the first part of being production ready!  #feeless #DLT #Blockchain #cryptocurrency with 1000 TPS and max. 10sec settlement time!  Who can beat that? #Bitcoin has ~ 5 TPS #Etherum has ~ 10 TPS
Really incredible to have watched the hard work and commitment that went into this latest release.  I'm already seeing reports of community members sharing how fast the new #IOTA mainnet is!

The #IOTA protocol has entered its, long awaited, mature phase. Funny how it goes, such development make all those #BTC #ETH #LINK obsolete but almost no one gets it yet. Well, they will... :)  Congratulations to the techies!!  https://t.co/f7fzBHBQzX

1 hour, 1 #Pizza, 0 #beer, some #saltstack devops, #hornet v0.5.0 and our upgraded corporate #IOTA 1.5 #Chrysalis Test-#Tangle is up & running, with a small worldwide Spamtest, look and feels fantastic! #IOTAstrong. Great job guys! More than 1600 CTPS (confirmed TX) no problem...  https://t.co/v3mtqhGjWd
